title: Mahindra taking steps to prepare staff for green shift, says Group CEO & MD Anish Shah
description: Technology is changing quite rapidly. But therein lies an opportunity to explore newer career possibilities. Working professionals must find time to upskill themselves at every turn of their career, says Mahindra Group CEO & MD Anish Shah.
